simpledb.remote
Class ResultSetMetaDataAdapter

java.lang.Object
  simpledb.remote.ResultSetMetaDataAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.sql.ResultSetMetaData, java.sql.Wrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleMetaData
public abstract class ResultSetMetaDataAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.ResultSetMetaData

This class implements all of the methods of the ResultSetMetaData interface, by throwing an exception for each one. Subclasses (such as SimpleMetaData) can override those methods that it want to implement.

Author:
Edward Sciore
